game.name: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone은 몸이 잘려 나가 사방에 나뒹구는 3인칭 칼싸움 게임입니다. 정신만 다운로드되어 로봇 검투사의 몸 속에서 부활한 당신은 아레나에서 펼쳐지는 비열한 시련 속에서 살아남아야 합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone is a robot voxel slice-em-up where any part of your body can be sliced off. With your mind downloaded into a robot gladiator, you must survive the sinister trials of the arena.
